parameters.name: SelType
parameters.description: Selection type enable or disable as defined in swSelectType_e

parameters.name: State
parameters.description: True to enable selection of the specified type, false to disable the end-user's ability to select the item

title: ISldWorks.SetSelectionFilter
description: Sets the current selection filter values for the specified item type.
signature:
void SetSelectionFilter( 
   System.Int32
SelType
,
   System.Boolean
State
)

parameters.name: SelType
parameters.description: Selection type enable or disable as defined in swSelectType_e

parameters.name: State
parameters.description: True to enable selection of the specified type, false to disable the end-user's ability to select the item
